name: Yseros
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} an enemy, the enemy {ACTION_attacks} itself. The amount of damage dealt is based on the bearer's {STAT_attack}.
After an enemy {ACTION_attacks} itself, this relic {ACTION_attacks} it as well.
After an enemy {ACTION_casts} a healing spell, it {ACTION_casts} it on the bearer as well.
After this relic or its bearer {ACTION_attacks} an enemy, it removes the enemy's {ACTION_defending} status.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks}, it has a 50% chance to {ACTION_attack} an additional enemy. This effect can occur repeatedly.
This relic and its bearer deal 30% more damage with attacks.
After this relic or its bearer {ACTION_attacks} an enemy, they remove the enemy's {ACTION_provoking} status.
After an enemy {ACTION_casts} a spell that grants a buff, it {ACTION_casts} it on the bearer as well.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks}, it increases the bearer's {STAT_speed} by 5%.
After an enemy {ACTION_casts} a stat-boosting spell, it {ACTION_casts} it on the bearer as well.
title: Goddess of Illusion
